trans-unit.source: Represents a list control that encapsulates a group of radio button controls.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en listekontroll som innkapsler en gruppe panel for kontroller.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Specifying List Layout](#specifying_list_layout) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The RadioButtonList control provides page developers with a single-selection radio button group that can be dynamically generated through data binding.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [angir oppsettet](#specifying_list_layout) - [tilgjengelighet](#accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## innføring i RadioButtonList kontrollen gir siden utviklere en enkel merking alternativknappgruppen som kan genereres dynamisk via databinding.

trans-unit.source: It contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection with members that correspond to individual items on the list.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samling med medlemmer som tilsvarer individuelle elementer i listen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine which item is selected, test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A> property of the list.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå hvilke element, kan du teste det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A>-egenskapen for listen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying List Layout You can specify how the list is rendered by setting the and properties.
trans-unit.target: ## Angir oppsettet kan du angi hvordan listen gjengis ved å angi den og Egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: For information about layout options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Finner informasjon om alternativer for oppsett av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection%2A> is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection%2A>er satt til `RepeatDirection.Vertical`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` causes the control to render the list horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` fører til at kontrollen ikke gjengi listen vannrett.

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: Noen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>innstillingene tillater ikke at vannrett oppsett.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a RadioButtonList control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke validering Kontroller bekrefte brukerinndata før den angitte teksten i en RadioButtonList-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [sikre standardkontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [slik: beskytte mot skriptet utnytter i et webprogram ved å bruke HTML-koding til strenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [validering brukerinndata i ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```              ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```              ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden (i piksler) mellom kantlinjen og innholdet i cellen i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>er satt til `RepeatLayout.Table`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å kontrollere avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling angitt legges til alle sidene av en celle.

trans-unit.source: It uses the height of the tallest cell in the table and the width of the widest cell in the table.
trans-unit.target: Den bruker høyden på den høyeste cellen i tabellen og bredden på de største cellen i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: Cellestørrelsen på resulterende brukes enhetlig alle cellene i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler størrelser kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden (i piksler) mellom kantlinjen og innholdet i cellen i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden (i piksler) mellom tilstøtende celler.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>er satt til `RepeatLayout.Table`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å kontrollere avstanden mellom individuelle celler i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: This property is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes både loddrett og vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden (i piksler) mellom tilstøtende celler.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Creates a style object that is used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control to implement all style-related properties.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et stilobjekt som er brukt internt av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> implementere alle stil-relaterte egenskaper i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is used primarily by control developers in custom control that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlStyle brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinert kontroll som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder stilegenskaper for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified ID and path offset.
trans-unit.target: Søker gjeldende beholder for navngivning for serverkontroll med den angitte forskyvningen ID og banen.

trans-unit.source: The FindControl method always returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FindControl returnerer alltid den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The FindControl method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FindControl brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The FindControl method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FindControl overstyrer <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden til base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You should not override this version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke overstyre denne versjonen av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to find.
trans-unit.target: IDen for kontrollen for å finne.

trans-unit.source: The number of controls up the page control hierarchy needed to reach a naming container.
trans-unit.target: Antall kontroller siden Kontroller hierarki kreves for å nå en naming beholder.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for den angitte elementtypen i den angitte indeksen i listen.

trans-unit.source: The GetItemStyle method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetItemStyle brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The style attribute for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control applies to all list items that are contained by the control.
trans-unit.target: Stilattributtet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen gjelder for alle listeelementer som finnes i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control to examine or set the style attribute for the control and its list items.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen for å undersøke eller angi stilattributtet for kontrollen og tilhørende listeelementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: En ordensindeksen som angir plasseringen til elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, indicating that style attributes are not set on individual list items in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, som angir at Stilattributter som ikke er angitt for individuelle listeelementer i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen inneholder en bunntekst-delen.

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasFooter brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Footers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekst er ikke støttes når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> does not contain a footer section.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, som angir at det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> inneholder ikke en bunntekstdel.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen inneholder en overskrift-delen.

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasHeader brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Headers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: Hoder er ikke støttes når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control does not contain a heading section.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, som angir at en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen inneholder ikke en del av overskrift.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control contains separators between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen inneholder skilletegn mellom elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: The HasSeparators property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasSeparators brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Separators are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: Skilletegn er ikke støttes når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control does not contain separators.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, som angir at en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen ikke inneholder skilletegn.

trans-unit.source: Processes the posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Behandler postede data for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method indicates whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData angir om tilstanden til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: In other words, it determines whether the selected list item in the control is the same as the last posted value.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, fastsette om valgte listeelementet i kontrollen er den samme som den siste postede verdien.

trans-unit.source: A user changing the selected item in the control changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: En bruker endrer det valgte elementet i kontrollen endres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>verdi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the same list item is selected in the control, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control is disabled, LoadPostData returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis samme listeelement er valgt i kontrollen, eller hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen er deaktivert, LoadPostData returnerer `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: When the LoadPostData method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method for the control.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden LoadPostData returnerer `true` ASP.NET siden framework aktiverer for en kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>metode for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the `postCollection`.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkel-ID for kontrollen som brukes til indeks i `postCollection`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om verdi indekseres av kontrollen identifikatorer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> is different from the last posting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> er forskjellig fra siste bokføringen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler ASP.NET-programmet som tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework calls the RaisePostDataChangedEvent method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET siden framework kaller RaisePostDataChangedEvent-metoden på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A>metoden indikerer at tilstanden til elementene er endret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall RaisePostDataChangedEvent den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode til å øke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user changes the selected item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode til å utføre egendefinerte behandling når brukeren endrer det valgte elementet i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `RaisePostBackEvent` method can optionally perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: Den `RaisePostBackEvent` metoden kan eventuelt utføre før du opprettet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control is selected, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to be validated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke validere gruppe vises på siden når et listeelement i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen er merket, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapene som skal `true`, og angi deretter gruppen for å validere i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control on the client.
trans-unit.target: Viser den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontroll på klienten.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The Render method implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> object for the list, and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A> method to render individual radio button list items.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelse metodeimplementering for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollere initialisere en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo>objekt for listen, og kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>metoden som i sin tur bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A>metode til å gjengi individuelle alternativknapper for listeelementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder utdata dataflyten for gjengivelse på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Renders a list item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser et listeelement i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.Render%2A> method implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> object for the list, and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the RenderItem method to render individual radio-button list items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.Render%2A>metodeimplementering for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollere initialisere en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo>objekt for listen, og kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>metoden som brukes i sin tur RenderItem-metoden til å gjengi individuelle alternativknapp listeelementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderItem method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderItem for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen ignorerer den `itemType` og `repeatInfo` parametere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The `repeatIndex` parameter value is used to select the radio button list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Den `repeatIndex` parameterverdien brukes til å velge panel knappen-listeelementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samlingen og valgte listeelementet gjengis i output-dataflyten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: En ordensindeksen som angir plasseringen til elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"></xref> that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"> </xref> som representerer informasjonen brukes til å gjengi elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen gjengis Hvis datakilden inneholder ingen data, eller hvis kontrollen ikke er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen gjengis Hvis datakilden har ingen data eller kontrollen ikke er bundet til data; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet kolonner som skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, kan du bruke denne egenskapen til å angi antallet kolonner som viser elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control displays all items in the list in a single column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen viser alle elementer i listen i en enkelt kolonne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner som skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns is set to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner er satt til en negativ verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which the radio buttons within the group are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir retningen som valgknappene i gruppen vises.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi sorteringsretningen visning av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Antallet kolonner som skal vises alltid fastsettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `RepeatDirection.Vertical` og hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, den første kolonnen fylles fra topp til bunn, deretter Neste kolonne, og så videre til alle elementer gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A> is set to 3, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control are displayed in three columns.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>er satt til 3, elementene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen skal vises i tre kolonner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: A nine-item list would appear as follows.
trans-unit.target: Det vises en liste med ni-elementer som følger.

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| |1|4|7| |2|5|8| |3|6|9| If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| |&1; |&4; |&7; | |&2; |&5; |&8; | |&3; |&6; |&9; | Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` og hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>elementene i listen skal vises i rader som er lastet inn fra venstre mot høyre, topp til bunn, deretter før alle elementer gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A> is set to 3, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control are displayed in rows of three items.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>er satt til 3, elementene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollen skal vises i radene i tre elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: A nine-item list would appear as follows.
trans-unit.target: Det vises en liste med ni-elementer som følger.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The display direction of the list is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Vis sorteringsretningen listen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of list items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The RepeatedItemCount property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RepeatedItemCount brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere i egendefinerte kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: If there are no items set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, the RepeatedItemCount property is zero.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen elementer som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll, RepeatedItemCount-egenskapen er null.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: If there are items set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, the RepeatedItemCount property is the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det ikke er angitt elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll, egenskapen RepeatedItemCount er lik den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the list control.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the list will be rendered by using a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""></xref> element, an <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""></xref> element, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om listen skal gjengis ved hjelp av en <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref> element, en <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""> </xref> element, en <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""> </xref> elementet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: For information about the available options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om de tilgjengelige alternativene, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Two options are new as of ASP.NET 4: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > To alternativene er nye fra ASP.NET-4: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: Some RepeatLayout settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: Noen RepeatLayout innstillingene tillater ikke at vannrett oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the list will be rendered by using a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""></xref> element, an <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""></xref> element, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om listen skal gjengis ved hjelp av en <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref> element, en <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""> </xref> element, en <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""> </xref> elementet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The radio button layout is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Oppsett av panel er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Prosesser lagt ut data for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to process posted data for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å behandle lagt ut data for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden er en eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem implementering.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the `postCollection`.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkel-ID for kontrollen som brukes til indeks i `postCollection`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om verdi indekseres av kontrollen identifikatorer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server control's state changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis serveren kontrollens tilstanden endret som et resultat av tilbakesending; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when posted data for a control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Starter når postede data for en kontroll er endret.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to raise an event when the posted data for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en hendelse når postede data for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontrollere endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for den angitte elementtypen i den angitte indeksen i listen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.GetItemStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve the style of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.GetItemStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente stilen for et element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.GetItemStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: En ordensindeksen som angir plasseringen til elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that represents the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som representerer stilen for den angitte elementtypen i den angitte indeksen i listen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the list control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen inneholder en bunntekst-delen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list control contains a footer section; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis listen inneholder en bunntekstinndelingen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the list control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen inneholder en overskrift-delen.

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>forekomsten endres til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list control contains a header section; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis listen inneholder toppteksten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the list control contains a separator between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen inneholder et skilletegn mellom elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list control contains has separators; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis listen inneholder har skilletegn; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders an item in the list with the specified information.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser et element i listen med den angitte informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to render items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode til å gjengi elementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: En ordensindeksen som angir plasseringen til elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"></xref> that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"> </xref> som representerer informasjonen brukes til å gjengi elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the list control.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet elementer i listen.

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>forekomsten endres til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment for the radio buttons within the group.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstjusteringen for valgknappene i gruppen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the radio buttons appears on the left or right.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi om teksten tilknyttet valgknappene vises på venstre eller høyre.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the radio button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `TextAlign.Right`, teksten vises til høyre for alternativet.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the radio button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `TextAlign.Left`, teksten vises til venstre for alternativet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The label text alignment associated with the radio buttons is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Etiketten tekstjustering tilknyttet valgknappene er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"> </xref> verdier.
